page.title: 09FAWKHAM MANOR CLINIC
page.content: Fawkham Manor clinic is a private med ical,surgical and convalescent home. Built on the site of the now demolished Manor the clinic is set in 5 acres of formal English gardens.Mr. W.Charnley set up the clinic in l980 with 40 beds. As a company called Beresford Homes (Thanet)Ltd he,his wife & son run the clinic now grown in size with beds for 2000inpatients & 8000 outpatients. Members of Independent Hospital groups are accepted here.There are at least l00 trained local nurses and at least two doctors,a surgeon, anaestetish and physiotherapist.Attached are 36 outside consultants.Each room is fitted with a telephone,radio system,colourT.V.and a call system to the Sister's office. The reception and patients lounge are conf- ortably furnished.A calming,restful, relaxing environment.
